name: Complex Roots of a Control System
description: Observe how changing the location of complex roots of a system modifies its output.

name: Number Recognition
description: Preview a neural network designed to recognize numbers that you can draw in real time!

name: Electric Fields
description: Take a look at the electric fields generated by charges, and simulate their motion (ignoring magnetism).

name: Electric Plates
description: Simulate how infinitely large electricly charged plates interact with each other.

name: Mandelbrot Set
description: Take a look at the Mandelbrot set, generated entirely within your browser!

name: Linear Regression
description: Observe how a linear model gets more accurate with gradient descent.

name: Quadratic Regression
description: Observe how a quadratic model gets more accurate with gradient descent.

name: Osculating Circle of a Cardioid
description: Take a look at the circle that has the exact same curvature as a point on a curve.
